product_name: Swix F4 Univeral Easy Glide Wax
long_description: The easy-to-use F4 Univeral Easy Glide wax works in all snow conditions, from very wet to very cold. Just take off the cap and dab and polish onto your skis or snowboard for smooth gliding, easy turns and solid control. Wide and stiff foam applicator offers precise distribution, and felt polisher on the bottom of the container smooths out the wax. Swix F4 Univeral Easy Glide wax also prevents the base from drying out through oxidation and helps prevent scratches from poor snow conditions.
short_description: The easy-to-use F4 Univeral Easy Glide wax works in all snow conditions, from very wet to very cold.
